name: Shabot (Ickise)
description:
Shabot is a student project where you control a robot with four different movements.  He can go to the left or the right and jump to the left or the right. This project aiming to create a game that allows the player to pre-code 100% of the character's movement. 

This game has a potential, me and my friend would like to improve it by applying the principle of the game on all the game, that is to say: The environment, the enemies by synchronizing them to our movements, etc...

Credits:

Anthony Noël: Game Designer / Game Artist / Level Designer

Enzo Dufour: Lead Project / Game Developper / Game Designer
